name: rotki-workspace
description: A portfolio tracking, asset analytics and tax reporting application specializing in Cryptoassets that protects your privacy
author: Rotki Solutions GmbH <info@rotki.com>

scripts.electron:build: npm run build -w common && npm run electron:build -w app
scripts.build: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w app
scripts.docker:build: npm run build -w common && npm run build -w app -- --mode docker
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w common && npm run lint:check -w app && npm run lint:style -w app
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix -w common && npm run lint -w app
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:unit -w app
scripts.check:all: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test:unit --w app && npm run test:integration-ci -w app
scripts.clean:modules: rimraf node_modules app/node_modules common/node_modules app/dist app/electron-build common/lib
